tudbut.net.http

Class HTTPRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • tudbut.net.http.HTTPRequest

  • public class HTTPRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Fully compatible, fast version of java HTTP requests

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • HTTPRequest

        public HTTPRequest(HTTPRequestType requestType,
                   java.lang.String host,
                   int port,
                   java.lang.String path,
                   HTTPHeader... headers)
        Constructs a HTTPRequest without sending it
        Parameters:
        requestType - The type of the request, see HTTPRequestType.
        host - Host, add "https://" in front to attempt a HTTPS connection, otherwise, dont specify protocol
        port - Port, 80 is standard for HTTP, 443 is standard for HTTPS
        path - Path to request, use "/" for main path
        headers - HTTPHeaders to use, can be empty

      • HTTPRequest

        public HTTPRequest(HTTPRequestType requestTypeIn,
                   java.lang.String hostIn,
                   int portIn,
                   java.lang.String pathIn,
                   HTTPContentType type,
                   java.lang.String contentIn,
                   HTTPHeader... headersIn)
        Constructs a HTTPRequest without sending it
        Parameters:
        requestTypeIn - The type of the request, see HTTPRequestType.
        hostIn - Host, add "https://" in front to attempt a HTTPS connection, otherwise, dont specify protocol
        portIn - Port, 80 is standard for HTTP, 443 is standard for HTTPS
        pathIn - Path to request, use "/" for main path
        type - The type of the body
        contentIn - The body
        headersIn - HTTPHeaders to use, can be empty

      • sendKeepAlive

        public Partial<HTTPResponse> sendKeepAlive(int timeout)
        Sends the request asynchronously with optional timeout
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout at which to stop receiving, use -1 for infinity
        Returns:
        The response enclosed in a Partial
